1.1.name: wordpress/youtube-chromeless
1.1.description:
The YouTube Chromeless plugin (developed by CyberSEO.net and based on the Custom YouTube Video Player tutorial by TutorialZine.com) allows one to play YouTube videos in the Chromless player. Use the following tag style to insert the YouTube videos into your posts:

    [youtube :url width ]

where:

  • url - URL of the YouTube video you want to embed;
  • width - width of the chromeless player (height is being calculated automatically).
